page.title: 11Health In The Area.
page.content: In our area there are no doctors, dentists, or opticians, they are all just outside the area. {There is one {school nurse called Mrs Reynolds.} On average each school is visited once a month by her. We asked her opinion on local health. The houses are quite clean, but the roads and streets have quite a lot of litter. {The care for the old is quite {good.} In Poolsbrook they have bungalows for the old. Health visitors, district nurses, and chiropodists go to the houses. The most common{illness}for children is a cold. {Illnesses}like lung problems and bad backs are caused by working down the mines. We asked if there were any drug addicts the answer was "There must be"!. By ZOE ROWLANDS & CATHERINE HAYS.
